languages.text: "Мон-кай отравили сей мир, а затем мир их и сгубил. Что ж, хотя бы местные примитивные технологии способны избавить нас от схожей участи".
"The mon-keigh poisoned this world, and then the world destroyed them. At least the primitive technologies they left behind can spare us from suffering the same fate."
languages.original_text: "Мон-кай отравили сей мир, а затем мир их и сгубил. Что ж, хотя бы местные примитивные технологии способны избавить нас от схожей участи".

traits.locale_text: "The mon-keigh poisoned this world, and then the world destroyed them. At least the primitive technologies they left behind can spare us from suffering the same fate."
"The mon-keigh poisoned this world, and then the world destroyed them. At least the primitive technologies they left behind can spare us from suffering the same fate."
"The mon-keigh poisoned this world, and then the world destroyed them. At least the primitive technologies they left behind can spare us from suffering the same fate."
"The mon-keigh poisoned this world, and then the world destroyed them. At least the primitive technologies they left behind can spare us from suffering the same fate."
"The mon-keigh poisoned this world, and then the world destroyed them. At least the primitive technologies they left behind can spare us from suffering the same fate."

languages.text: “那些猴子毒害了这个世界，而这个世界又反过来毁灭了他们。不过，至少他们留下的原始科技可以让我们免于同样的命运。”
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh poisoned this world, and then the world destroyed them. At least the primitive technologies they left behind can spare us from suffering the same fate."

traits.locale_text: “那些猴子毒害了这个世界，而这个世界又反过来毁灭了他们。不过，至少他们留下的原始科技可以让我们免于同样的命运。”

languages.text: "Die Chem-Pan-Sey haben diese Welt vergiftet, und dann hat die Welt sie im Gegenzug zerstört. Zumindest können uns die primitiven Technologien, die sie zurückgelassen haben, vor diesem Schicksal bewahren."
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh poisoned this world, and then the world destroyed them. At least the primitive technologies they left behind can spare us from suffering the same fate."

traits.locale_text: "Die Chem-Pan-Sey haben diese Welt vergiftet, und dann hat die Welt sie im Gegenzug zerstört. Zumindest können uns die primitiven Technologien, die sie zurückgelassen haben, vor diesem Schicksal bewahren."

languages.text: « Les mon-keigh ont empoisonné ce monde, alors ce monde les a détruits. Par chance, leurs technologies, bien que primitives, vont nous permettre d'éviter de subir le même sort. »
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh poisoned this world, and then the world destroyed them. At least the primitive technologies they left behind can spare us from suffering the same fate."

traits.locale_text: « Les mon-keigh ont empoisonné ce monde, alors ce monde les a détruits. Par chance, leurs technologies, bien que primitives, vont nous permettre d'éviter de subir le même sort. »

languages.text: «Los mon-keigh envenenaron este mundo, que a su vez los destruyó. Por lo menos, las tecnologías primitivas que dejaron atrás pueden evitar que compartamos su destino».
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh poisoned this world, and then the world destroyed them. At least the primitive technologies they left behind can spare us from suffering the same fate."

traits.locale_text: «Los mon-keigh envenenaron este mundo, que a su vez los destruyó. Por lo menos, las tecnologías primitivas que dejaron atrás pueden evitar que compartamos su destino».

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイがこの世界を毒し、世界が彼らを滅ぼした。少なくとも、彼らが残した原始的な技術のおかげで、私たちが同じ運命をたどることは免れるだろう」
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh poisoned this world, and then the world destroyed them. At least the primitive technologies they left behind can spare us from suffering the same fate."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイがこの世界を毒し、世界が彼らを滅ぼした。少なくとも、彼らが残した原始的な技術のおかげで、私たちが同じ運命をたどることは免れるだろう」

languages.text: "Mon-keighler bu dünyayı zehirlemiş, dünya da onları mahvetmiş. En azından artlarında bıraktıkları ilkel teknolojiler sayesinde biz de aynı kadere mahkûm değiliz."
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh poisoned this world, and then the world destroyed them. At least the primitive technologies they left behind can spare us from suffering the same fate."
